title: Cloud storage
description: All data for a place is saved in a separate database instance.

title: Customization
description: You can change menu as many times as you want.

title: Customer support
description: Team will jump on your request and help you with any questions you have.

title: Orders storage
description: You can get grouped orders to see what users order more often.

title: Customizable UI
description: You can customize the UI to your needs, apply colors, fonts and layouts
